text: Edera age nuhera sbajati pratyakhyana karechila, ara tadera parera an'yan'ya dala'o, ara pratyeka sampradaya'i tadera rasula sanbandhe matalaba karechila tamke dhare anate, ara tara tarkatarki karata mithyara sahayye yena tara dbara tara satyake pangu kare phelate pare, phale ami tadera pakara'o karalama, sutaram kemana chila amara sastidana
